TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonButton implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示自定义功能区上的按钮。

span.span: Represents a button on a custom Ribbon.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Visual Studio 将创建一个实现类的实例接口时您拖动**按钮**控件从**Office 功能区控件**选项卡**工具箱**拖动到功能区设计器。Visual Studio creates an instance of a class that implements the interface when you drag a **Button** control from the **Office Ribbon Controls** tab of the **Toolbox** onto the Ribbon Designer. 此外可以在运行时创建此控件的实例，并将其添加到动态菜单。You can also create an instance of this control at run time and add it to a dynamic menu. 菜单是动态的如果您设置其属性设置为`true`。A menu is dynamic if you set its property to `true`. 可以设置此控件的某些属性，只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，或者该控件添加到动态菜单之前。Some properties of this control can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application or before the control is added to a dynamic menu at run time. 有关如何设置这些属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). 您可以创建在运行时通过使用方法的对象。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. ## 常规任务Common Tasks 下表列出了可用于常见任务的成员。The following table lists members that are useful for common tasks. |任务Task|成员Member| |----------|------------| |在运行时，将按钮添加到一个菜单，其中具有其属性设置为 true。At run time, add a button to a menu that has its property set to true.|创建实现的类的实例使用接口 Create an instance of a class that implements the interface by using the

方法的类。method of the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对 Office 项目中的对象的全局访问](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects.md)。For more information, see [Global Access to Objects in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects.md).

将实例添加到菜单的`Items`集合。Add the instance to the menu's `Items` collection.| |更改按钮的大小。Change the size of the button.|设置到所需的值。Set to the value you want. 例如，对于大型的按钮，将其设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。For example, for a large button, set it to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.| |在按钮上显示图像。Display an image on the button.|有三种方法可显示图像：There are three ways to display an image:

-使用属性。- Use the property. 此属性提供的最大控制。This property gives the most control.
-设置为你想要显示为按钮的图标的内置 Microsoft Office 映像的 ID。- Set to the ID of a built-in Microsoft Office image that you want to display as the icon for the button.
-使用属性连同事件。- Use the property along with the event. 此属性提供了一些性能优势。This property gives some performance benefits.| |禁用或隐藏按钮。Disable or hide buttons.|若要禁用按钮，设置到`false`。To disable a button, set to `false`.

若要隐藏按钮，设置到`false`。To hide a button, set to `false`.| |当用户单击按钮时运行代码。Run code when a user clicks the button.|将代码添加到事件处理程序。Add code to the event handler.| [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新按钮，设置各种属性的按钮，然后将按钮添加到菜单。The following example creates a new button, sets various properties of the button, and then adds the button to a menu. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 向组添加一个菜单。Add a menu to the group. 4. 设置**动态**属性的 menu 的`true`。Set the **Dynamic** property of the menu to `true`. 5. 设置**ItemSize**属性的到菜单上**RibbonControlSizeLarge**。Set the **ItemSize** property of the menu to **RibbonControlSizeLarge**. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#9](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/CS/Ribbon1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#9](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/VB/Ribbon1.vb#9)]

summary.span: 在用户单击按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the button.

summary.span: 获取或设置按钮的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the button.
A Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize that represents the size of the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该按钮菜单的一部分，则此属性无效。This property has no effect if the button is part of a menu. 始终显示一个按钮是一个菜单的一部分，如同其属性设置为父菜单的值属性。A button that is part of a menu is always displayed as if its property were set to the value of the parent menu's property. 若要使按钮显示得更大菜单上，设置的属性到`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。To make buttons appear larger on a menu, set the property of the to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. ## Examples 以下示例将显示得更大的按钮。The following example makes a button appear larger. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 向组添加一个按钮。Add a button to the group. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/CS/Ribbon1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/VB/Ribbon1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在将菜单的 属性设置为 Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge 时菜单中此按钮上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on this button in a menu when the property of the menu is set to Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge.

value.span: 如果此控件嵌套在另一个菜单或拆分按钮，显示的说明和属性的父菜单或拆分按钮的属性设置为Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge。

span.span: The description appears when this control is nested in another menu or split button, and the property of the parent menu, or the property of the split button, is set to Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge.

value.span: 可以在运行时更改此属性。

span.span: This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置在按钮上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the button.
An that is displayed on the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式是 PNG，因为 PNG 格式的图像支持通过其 alpha 通道的透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，该控件的外观被更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 如果设置属性，则和属性将被忽略。If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性可让您更好地控制比其他两个属性，这一点可以是速度较慢，因为每次更新控件时，图像对象发送到 Office 应用程序。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated. 属性必须为`true`控件来显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当您将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果您设置在运行时属性，则你必须设置属性设置为`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例设置的两个按钮的属性。The following example sets the property of two buttons. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 将两个按钮添加到组。Add two buttons to the group. 4. 将两个映像添加到项目资源。Add two images to the project resources. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#5](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/CS/Ribbon1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#5](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/VB/Ribbon1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 事件处理程序中标识按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that you can use to identify the button in the event handler.

value.span: 一个字符串，可用于在 事件处理程序中标识按钮。

span.span: A string that you can use in the event handler to identify the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). 有关设置此属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序此映像从你的解决方案只检索一次，以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 此属性可以设置只能在设计时，因为它标识的图像加载过程事件。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 时将引发一次每个映像名称显示在功能区。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后，不能使用此属性更改控件图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 若要加载图像，将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查的属性并设置属性的到想要加载的图像的对象。Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果忽略此属性属性或属性设置。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以稍快于标识的图像加载显示属性，因为 Office 应用程序中检索映像解决方案仅在首次从功能区。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed. 属性必须为`true`控件来显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当您将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果您设置在运行时属性，则你必须设置属性设置为`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例将缓存两个按钮的的图像。The following example caches the images for two buttons. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 将两个按钮添加到组。Add two buttons to the group. 4. 将两个映像添加到项目资源。Add two images to the project resources. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 添加或删除资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d). 然后可以在生成的功能区类中运行此代码。You can then run this code in the generated Ribbon class. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#6](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/CS/Ribbon1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#6](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/VB/Ribbon1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置按钮的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut of the button.

value.span: 一个表示该按钮的键盘快捷键的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the keyboard shortcut of the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Keytip 必须介于 1 到 3 个大写字符，不能包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时也称为访问密钥或加速器和用作激活控件的快捷组合键。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果内置控件或从其他加载项，你的快捷键提示与键提示冲突，Microsoft Office 可能会自动分配非冲突快捷键提示值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用键盘处理功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523). ## Examples 下面的示例将 KeyTip 分配给一个按钮和复选框。The following example assigns a KeyTip to a button and a check box. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 向组添加一个按钮和复选框。Add a button and a check box to the group. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#7](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/CS/Ribbon1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#7](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/VB/Ribbon1.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在按钮上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed on the button.

value.span: 一个表示该按钮上显示的文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the text that is displayed on the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要隐藏标签，设置到`false`。To hide the label, set to `false`.

summary.span: 如果想使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置在按钮上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on the button, if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: 作为此控件图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识的控件显示 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是一个字符串，标识`imageMso`所选图标的值。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，该控件的外观被更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关一系列`imageMso`值，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页[Office 2010 外接程序： 图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果忽略此属性属性设置。This property is ignored if the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以稍快于标识的图像加载属性，因为这些图像缓存在 Office 应用程序。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application. 属性必须为`true`控件来显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当您将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果您设置在运行时属性，则你必须设置属性设置为`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例将 Microsoft Office 图标的按钮。The following example assigns a Microsoft Office icon to a button. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 向组添加一个按钮。Add a button to the group. 4. 设置 **（名称）** 到按钮的属性`mySaveButton`。Set the **(Name)** property of the button to `mySaveButton`. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 如果按钮位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上，请获取或设置该按钮的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the button, if the button is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

value.span: 一个 ，表示 的位置（如果该控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

span.span: A that represents the position of the , if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). 属性时该按钮放置在功能区组中没有任何作用。The property has no effect when the button is placed in a group on the Ribbon. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将控件添加到 Backstage 视图](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add Controls to the Backstage View](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置当用户将指针移到按钮上方时显示的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets tooltip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the button.

value.span: 当用户将指针移到按钮上方时显示的工具提示文本。

span.span: The tooltip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屏幕提示值必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。The ScreenTip value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 当设置属性，则值将显示的标题为。When the property is set, the value appears as the title of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与按钮关联的图像是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the image that is associated with the button is visible.

value.span: 如果与按钮关联的图像可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image that is associated with the button is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性自动设置为`true`如果您设置， ，或在功能区设计器中的属性。This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the , , or property in the Ribbon Designer. 可以将其设置为`false`以与要隐藏此控件关联的图像。You can set it to `false` to cause the image associated with this control to be hidden. 设置， ，或在运行时属性的值不更改属性。Setting the , , or property at run time does not change the value of the property. 此属性不起作用的实例，此按钮上快速访问工具栏显示。This property has no effect for instances of this button that are displayed on the Quick Access Toolbar. 如果属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`，按钮的行为如同始终`true`。If the property is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`, the button behaves as if is always `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示按钮的标签是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for the button is visible.

value.span: 如果按钮的标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the label for the button is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`，按钮的行为如同始终`true`。If the property is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`, the button behaves as if is always `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置当用户将指针移到按钮上方时显示的多行提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the button.

value.span: 一个包含当用户将指针移到按钮上时显示的多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 下显示文本。The appears under text. 与不同，则启用换行符的字符串中。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string.
